title: DebtInterestEnum
description: Represents an enumeration list that specifies the general rule for periodic interest rate payment.

oneOf.title: Fixed
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to a fixed interest rate.

oneOf.title: Floating
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to a floating interest rate.

oneOf.title: IndexLinked
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to one or more price or other indices (other than inflation rates).

oneOf.title: InflationLinked
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to one or more specified inflation rates.

oneOf.title: InterestOnly
oneOf.description: Denotes a stripped bond representing only the interest component.

oneOf.title: InverseFloating
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to the inverse of a floating interest rate.

oneOf.title: OtherStructured
oneOf.description: Denotes payment calculated with reference to other underlyings (not being floating interest rates, inflation rates or indices) or with a non-linear relationship to floating interest rates, inflation rates or indices.

oneOf.title: ZeroCoupon
oneOf.description: Denotes a zero coupon bond that does not pay intetrest.
